articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ECOWAS defence chiefs agree ‘D-day’ for Niger military intervention - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: West African bloc agrees to activate standby force as a last resort if diplomatic efforts fail after coup in Niger.
articles.content:
West Africas main bloc has agreed on a D-day for possible military intervention to restore democracy in Niger after generals toppled and detained President Mohamed Bazoum last month.

articles.author: Jamiel Lynch
articles.title: Little Rock schools will allow African American class to count for graduation, in break from Arkansas state officials - CNN
articles.description: In a sharp break from Arkansas education officials, the Little Rock School District said in a news release it will offer AP African American Studies for credit.
articles.content:
